DESCRIPTION
A disturbing childhood incident links the fate of three women 
terrorized by diabolical ordeals in Amusement. Directed by John 
Simpson (Freeze Frame) from a screenplay from Jake Wade Wall ("When A 
Stranger Calls", "The Hitcher"), Amusement is an anthology of 
seemingly unrelated vignettes shockingly tied together by a common, 
twisted thread from the past of three former schoolmates.

RIP NOTES
Previous XviD release was 4:3 fullscreen, Who knows why WaLMaRT ripped 
fullscreen when widescreen was available on the same NTSC DVD...

Runtime seems shorter on this because this is indeed from PAL source, 
but as everyone should know, 25fps is faster than 23.976fps.
